projectdescription: The EasyThreads website includes a dashboard, a main page and much more. The backend is written in Javascript (NodeJS & ExpressJS), just like the frontend. We use mustache as a template engine to create dynamic pages. We use MongoDB for our database. On this project you can change various settings of your EasyThreads (Discord app) in real time and apply it directly to your Discord server. One of the biggest challenge is create an safe infrastructure to ensure customer safety.

The EasyThreads documentation is based on Facebook's open source project 'Docusaurus' - an optimized page generator built in React. For this project, I customized Docusaurus to create a better user experience. I created custom components and much more to make the documentation of the Discord app more accessible to everyone.

This is my personal portfolio. If you're reading this, chances are you're looking at my portfolio! ðŸ¥¹ It's an AstroJS-built application. The website is fully responsive, and the source code is on GitHub. I picked AstroJS as the framework because I wanted to learn something new. This way, I have a live project where I can test my learning curve with Astro.
